content.question: Which of the following sentences, if added after sentence 10, would be most effective in acknowledging the viewpoint of the Anti-Stratfordians regarding Shakespeare’s education?

choices.label: It is true that no student registers from this period in the school’s history have survived.
When Shakespeare was a boy, the population of Stratford-upon-Avon was probably less than 2,000.
Sadly, the value placed on rhetoric is far less today than it was during Shakespeare’s time.
In the 1570s, when Shakespeare was a student, the curriculum may or may not have included Greek.

content.answer: It is true that no student registers from this period in the school’s history have survived.
